requestParams.name: business_hours_advanced
requestParams.desc: 营业时间,按天设置,一天只支持设置一个连续的时间段。

requestParams.name: county_id
requestParams.desc: 行政区划代码。参考高德城市编码表 http://lbs.amap.com/api/webservice/download

requestParams.name: image
requestParams.desc: 图片地址，逗号分隔。注：图片需要先上传到有赞平台

requestParams.name: is_optional_self_fetch_time
requestParams.desc: 是否需要买家选择自提时间。1表示需要，0表示不需要

requestParams.name: is_self_fetch
requestParams.desc: 是否是自提点。1表示是，0表示否

requestParams.name: is_store
requestParams.desc: 是否是门店。1表示是，0表示否

requestParams.name: local_delivery_polygon
requestParams.desc: 同城配送范围多边形,只有当local_delivery_scope_type=2时生效。格式如：点1经度,点1纬度|点2经度,点2纬度|点3经度，点3纬度|点4经度，点4纬度...（百度坐标系）

requestParams.name: local_delivery_scope
requestParams.desc: 配送范围，单位米。只有当local_delivery_scope_type=1时生效。

requestParams.name: local_delivery_scope_type
requestParams.desc: 同城配送范围划分方式：1半径 2多边形

requestParams.name: only_bussiness_hours_open
requestParams.desc: 0 否， 1 只允许营业时间下单

requestParams.name: support_local_delivery
requestParams.desc: 是否支持本地配送。1表示支持，0表示不支持

requestParams.name: tag_ids
requestParams.desc: 标签id列表，逗号分隔。需要先创建网点分组

responseParams.name: id
responseParams.desc: 成功时返回新增的网点id

struct.name: id
struct.desc: 成功时返回新增的网点id

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['address']="黄龙万科中心"
params['area']="西湖区"
params['business_hours_advanced']="[{"open_time":"00:00","close_time":"01:00","weekdays":["周一"]}]"
params['city']="杭州市"
params['county_id']="330106"
params['description']="这是一段描述"
params['image']="https://dn-kdt-img.qbox.me/upload_files/2016/02/18/Fo9Y4eki-GoHmOvKGbZxC7hRIzoA?imageView2/2/w/240/h/240/q/75/format/me/upload_files/2016/02/18/fo9y4eki-gohmovkgbzxc7hrizoa,http://dn-kdt-img.qbox.me/upload_files/2016/02/18/Fo9Y4eki-GoHmOvKGbZxC7hRIzoA,http://dn-kdt-img.qbox.me/upload_files/2016/02/18/Fo9Y4eki-GoHmOvKGbZxC7hRIzoA!240x240.jpg"
params['is_self_fetch']=1
params['is_store']=1
params['lat']="30.281374"
params['lng']="120.132657"
params['local_delivery_scope']="0"
params['local_delivery_start_amount']="0"
params['name']="有赞云测试"
params['phone1']="0571"
params['phone2']="18888888888"
params['province']="浙江省"
params['support_local_delivery']=1
params['is_optional_self_fetch_time']=1
params['local_delivery_scope_type']=2
params['local_delivery_polygon']="120.122257,30.290374|120.143057,30.290374|120.143057,30.272374|120.122257,30.272374"
params['local_delivery_fee']=10
params['only_bussiness_hours_open']=1
params['bussiness_hours_type']=0

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.multistore.offline.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'黄龙万科中心', 'area' => '西湖区', 'business_hours_advanced' => '[{"open_time":"00:00","close_time":"01:00","weekdays":["周一"]}]', 'city' => '杭州市', 'county_id' => '330106', 'description' => '这是一段描述', 'image' => 'https://dn-kdt-img.qbox.me/upload_files/2016/02/18/Fo9Y4eki-GoHmOvKGbZxC7hRIzoA?imageView2/2/w/240/h/240/q/75/format/me/upload_files/2016/02/18/fo9y4eki-gohmovkgbzxc7hrizoa,http://dn-kdt-img.qbox.me/upload_files/2016/02/18/Fo9Y4eki-GoHmOvKGbZxC7hRIzoA,http://dn-kdt-img.qbox.me/upload_files/2016/02/18/Fo9Y4eki-GoHmOvKGbZxC7hRIzoA!240x240.jpg', 'is_self_fetch' => '1', 'is_store' => '1', 'lat' => '30.281374', 'lng' => '120.132657', 'local_delivery_scope' => '0', 'local_delivery_start_amount' => '0', 'name' => '有赞云测试', 'phone1' => '0571', 'phone2' => '18888888888', 'province' => '浙江省', 'support_local_delivery' => '1', 'is_optional_self_fetch_time' => '1', 'local_delivery_scope_type' => '2', 'local_delivery_polygon' => '120.122257,30.290374|120.143057,30.290374|120.143057,30.272374|120.122257,30.272374', 'local_delivery_fee' => '10', 'only_bussiness_hours_open' => '1', 'bussiness_hours_type' => '0', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
